Text.Page:
.

The Federation has an urgent mission for you.

I'd like you to carry out the mission.

You can find me in Balderon.

The Federation sent Vella to track down Dakuryon's location, but she has since disappeared.

When you went looking, you found Vella unconscious in Frost Reach. You brought her back to Allemantheia for her to regain her strength.

The Federation has been trying to track down Dakuryon ever since the Argons started getting up to their old tricks again. The Federation is also searching for a man named Armen, whom Manahan had spoken about.

However, contact with the High Elf Agent Vella has been lost.

You have been tasked with finding her. Let's look for Vella together.Do you have any clues as to her whereabouts yet?
The last contact with her was in <font color='#0000FF'>Frost Reach</font> in <font color='#0000FF'>Westonia</font>. It's best if we start our search there.

An elf by the name of Vella...

Ah! I remember her. She looked very serious. That's why I noticed her in the first place.

She'd asked if I'd encountered argons in this area, then set off toward the Azurice Shrine.

I'd warned her it was dangerous there, but to no avail."How can I find her?"

If you just keep marching on, you'll freeze to death in this place.
I will loan you an excellent sleuth. Take him with you on your search.

Tukgu! Tukgu! Where did Tukgu go?

This is such a hassle. He seems to be out of earshot.

Try cooking something to eat in the pot. He won't be able to resist the aroma, and he'll appear in a flash.

He has a unique nose for tracking. Join him on the search.

Urgh...
The teleportal... I need the teleportal...

(She seems to have lost consciousness).

It's a stroke of luck that you found Vella, but her body temperature is low, so she's still in danger. Also, a strange glyph was found on her body.

Apparently it's something to do with a teleportal, but I think she's talking about the fragments

Let's collect the fragments and go to Allemantheia. Vella needs treatment as soon as possible.

The teleportal has been smashed.

Let's collect the pieces and get ready for the journey to Allemantheia.

It's not looking good for Vella.

I'll take care of her. Please transport the teleportal.

I'll find someone who can look after Vella in her condition.

Please wait here with Hasmina.
